ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Thomas R. Lofchik ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. THOMAS R. LOFCHIK, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective August 3, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
